text:
:sprocket-dance:As per our previous reminders, today is the day! In a couple of hours we'll be <https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1fnwCzrYD2fLNPCYP7NNshTJi4gM36vWpHBTU0ALQaSQ/edit#gid=1564945604|archiving or renaming multiple public channel>s in order to make it easier to connect in the HubSpot Developer Slack. :sprocket-dance:

Once these changes go live, don't hesitate to reach out to me with any feedback. Channels will be archived, still searchable, and always possible to revive should the demand be there. Thank you!
